detaileddescription.para: Instance all catalogs for use if it's not the case return the number of catalog available

Execute an access function on the first catalog compatible in the catalog list return the result of the first valid catalog for a given URL
result of the access method or -1 if error and set GError with the correct value error : EPROTONOSUPPORT means that the URL is not matched by a catalog

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle handle, const char *path, mode_t mode, GError **err)
memberdef.name: gfal_catalog_chmodG

detaileddescription.para:
Execute the chmod function on the first compatible catalog ( checked with check_url func )
0 if success or -1 and set the GError to the correct errno value with a description msg

memberdef.argsstring: (gfal_handle handle, const char *oldpath, const char *newpath, GError **err)
memberdef.name: gfal_catalog_renameG

detaileddescription.para:
Execute the rename function on the first compatible catalog ( checked with check_url func )
0 if success or -1 and set the GError to the correct errno value with a description msg
return the catalog type configured at compilation time

simplesect.para: return a string of the type of the catalog return NULL if an error occured and set the GError correctly

detaileddescription.para: Note that hte default catalog is the first one

briefdescription.para: the file of the common lib for the catalog management
